Your Privacy Matters

Privacy Policy

How we collect, use, and protect your information

At SlugPost, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

1

Information We Collect

Information You Provide: Post content, account details (email, name, password), and custom slugs.

Automatically Collected: IP address, browser information, usage data, and session cookies.

2

How We Use Your Information

We use your data to provide our service, authenticate users, secure edit tokens, improve performance, prevent fraud, send service updates, and analyze usage patterns.

3

Data Sharing

ðŸ”’ We do NOT sell your personal information

We only share data with your consent, trusted service providers, when legally required, or for public posts.

4

Data Security

We protect your data with encrypted passwords, secure tokens, HTTPS encryption, regular security audits, and limited data access.

5

Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, delete, export your data, and opt-out of communications. Contact us at maulana@drip.id to exercise these rights.

6

Cookies

We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

7

Data Retention

We retain your data as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. You can request deletion at any time.

8

Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services (hosting, email, analytics) that have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review their policies.

9

Children's Privacy

Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

10

Changes to Privacy Policy

We may update this policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

11

Contact Us

For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact us:

maulana@drip.id
